entry.title: New release for Manyfold: v0.66.2
entry.content:
Small hotfix to stop invalid filenames being created during 3MF export.

What's Changed

üêõ Bug Fixes üêõ

  • Fix invalid filenames in 3MF export by @Floppy in https://github.com/manyfold3d/manyfold/pull/2173

Full Changelog: https://github.com/manyfold3d/manyfold/compare/v0.66.1...v0.66.2

entry.title: New release for Manyfold: v0.67.0
entry.content:
This release introduces optional, anonymous, as-private-as-possible usage tracking, purely so that we can answer the question "how many people are using Manyfold?". There is a detailed breakdown of exactly what data is collected and how we use it in the admin manual, but in summary, we collect only the application version you're running, and we can't access or save it, other than getting aggregated statistics.

Privacy is super important to us, so we've put a lot of work in to make this as difficult for ourselves as possible! And of course, it's completely optional and off by default, so you can choose whether or not you want to report in.

Having said all that, letting us know is super useful, so if you're comfortable doing so, please please turn on the reporting in settings! ‚ù§Ô∏è

What's Changed

‚ú® New Features ‚ú®

  • Anonymous OPT-IN usage tracking by @Floppy in https://github.com/manyfold3d/manyfold/pull/2183

üõ†Ô∏è Other Improvements üõ†Ô∏è

  • Removes account deletion box in single-user mode by @matthewbadeau in https://github.com/manyfold3d/manyfold/pull/2175
  • Adds .well-known URI for password change by @matthewbadeau in https://github.com/manyfold3d/manyfold/pull/2174
  • Don't schedule background usage reporting job if not enabled by @Floppy in https://github.com/manyfold3d/manyfold/pull/2188

Full Changelog: https://github.com/manyfold3d/manyfold/compare/v0.66.2...v0.67.0

entry.title: New release for Manyfold: v0.68.0
entry.content:
A small release this week, while we do some more big changes behind the scenes for a future release. Main thing is an improvement to the automatic grouping of files in models, so that they get arranged in a more sensible way. There's more to improve here, but this should make things a bit more useful!

What's Changed

‚ú® New Features ‚ú®

  • Improve automatic part grouping in models by @Floppy in https://github.com/manyfold3d/manyfold/pull/2211

üõ†Ô∏è Other Improvements üõ†Ô∏è

  • Add target="_blank" to footer links by @chryton in https://github.com/manyfold3d/manyfold/pull/2200
  • Adding app version as an attribute by @matthewbadeau in https://github.com/manyfold3d/manyfold/pull/2194

New Contributors

  • @chryton made their first contribution in https://github.com/manyfold3d/manyfold/pull/2200

Full Changelog: https://github.com/manyfold3d/manyfold/compare/v0.67.0...v0.68.0

entry.title: New release for Manyfold: v0.69.0
entry.content:
We had a security audit recently, thanks to NLNet / NGI Zero and Radically Open Security. This release fixes a load of security issues that were found in the audit, many of which fix other bugs at the same time.

The biggest obvious change is that you should now set PUID and PGID environment variables to specify which user and group Manyfold should run as - before, it would run as root because that's what Docker does by default, and that's obviously a security risk. If you don't set those variables, it will continue to run as root, but it will warn you loudly until you change it! Don't forget to make sure that your libraries are writable by the user you choose!

Visit our new Security page for more details on these and other new options to make your instances more secure!

What's Changed

‚ú® New Features ‚ú®

  • Show admins a security alert if container is being run as root by @Floppy in https://github.com/manyfold3d/manyfold/pull/2252
  • Add PUID and PGID env vars to control which user the app runs as by @Floppy in https://github.com/manyfold3d/manyfold/pull/2253
  • Lock accounts temporarily after too many failed login attempts by @Floppy in https://github.com/manyfold3d/manyfold/pull/2254
  • Show free space in upload selector and library details (for admins only) by @Floppy in https://github.com/manyfold3d/manyfold/pull/2260
  • Limit file upload size by @Floppy in https://github.com/manyfold3d/manyfold/pull/2266
  • Add HTTPS_ONLY env option to force secure-only connections by @Floppy in https://github.com/manyfold3d/manyfold/pull/2275
  • Limit size of extracted files on upload by @Floppy in https://github.com/manyfold3d/manyfold/pull/2281

üêõ Bug Fixes üêõ

  • Restrict problem viewing to contributors, not viewers by @Floppy in https://github.com/manyfold3d/manyfold/pull/2257
  • Set secure flags on libarchive extraction to avoid "Zip Slip" exploits by @Floppy in https://github.com/manyfold3d/manyfold/pull/2258
  • Fix upload file filter on Windows machines by @Floppy in https://github.com/manyfold3d/manyfold/pull/2261
  • Fix translation linter error by @Floppy in https://github.com/manyfold3d/manyfold/pull/2262
  • Avoid naming race condition on upload by @Floppy in https://github.com/manyfold3d/manyfold/pull/2268
  • Stop username enumeration through password reset form by @Floppy in https://github.com/manyfold3d/manyfold/pull/2283
  • Check problematic item exists when rendering problem list by @Floppy in https://github.com/manyfold3d/manyfold/pull/2289
  • Allow inline style attributes in Content-Security-Policy by @Floppy in https://github.com/manyfold3d/manyfold/pull/2290

üõ†Ô∏è Other Improvements üõ†Ô∏è

  • Check file extension before unzipping uploads by @Floppy in https://github.com/manyfold3d/manyfold/pull/2267
  • Make the "remember me" cookie HTTPS-only if appropriate by @Floppy in https://github.com/manyfold3d/manyfold/pull/2276
  • Completely reset user session on logout by @Floppy in https://github.com/manyfold3d/manyfold/pull/2279
  • Add session timeouts to reduce session fixation/hijacking by @Floppy in https://github.com/manyfold3d/manyfold/pull/2280
  • Mitigate timing attacks on user lookups by @Floppy in https://github.com/manyfold3d/manyfold/pull/2282
  • Change from cocoon to cocooned by @Floppy in https://github.com/manyfold3d/manyfold/pull/2259
  • Remove external jQuery and selectize scripts by @Floppy in https://github.com/manyfold3d/manyfold/pull/2285
  • Reduce javascript payload with tree-shaking by @Floppy in https://github.com/manyfold3d/manyfold/pull/2286
  • Add Content-Security-Policy to increase security by @Floppy in https://github.com/manyfold3d/manyfold/pull/2287

Full Changelog: https://github.com/manyfold3d/manyfold/compare/v0.68.0...v0.69.0
